block.p: OLINER--David. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the untimely loss of David Oliner, beloved husband of Barbara Oliner, a cherished friend of the Jewish community whose involvement strengthens our ability to serve those in need. We extend our deepest sympathies to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O

OLINER--David. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the untimely loss of David Oliner, beloved husband of Barbara Oliner, a cherished friend of the Jewish community whose involvement strengthens our ability to serve those in need. We extend our deepest sympathies to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O
